mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 AND r.deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort_order ASC, m.create_time ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{menuId} AND deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM sys_role_menu WHERE menu_id = #{menuId}
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE permission = #{permission} AND deleted = 0
